dc.title: NIDA for Teens: Brain Games - Sara's Quest
dc.description: Sara's Quest is an interactive game based on the Mind Over Matter series created by The National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) to educate adolescents ages 11 through 15 (as well as their parents and teachers) on the science behind drug abuse.
